mapper.select: select COUNT(user_id) from db_bs.`team` where db_bs.`team`.version_id in(SELECT db_bs.`version`.id from db_bs.`version` WHERE `status`=1) and db_bs.`team`.user_id=#{userId} and team.sfyx=1

SELECT version.id, CONCAT(project.`name`,' - ',version.`name`) versionname FROM version, project WHERE project.id = version.project_id AND version.id IN ( SELECT team.version_id FROM team WHERE user_id = #{userid} and team.sfyx=1) and version.status=1 and project.enduser_id is null

select version.id,version.name,version.createtime, (select db_bs.user.name from db_bs.user where db_bs.user.id= version.creatuser_id ) createName, version.status, FORMAT((select COUNT(work.id) FROM `work` WHERE `work`.version_id =version.id and work.`status`='2')/(select COUNT(work.id) FROM `work` WHERE `work`.version_id =version.id and (work.`status`='1' or work.`status`='2'))*100,2) worknum from db_bs.version where version.project_id=#{pId} ORDER BY status desc ,createtime
mapper.update: update version set version.status=2 ,version.enduser_id=#{userId},version.endtime=now() where version.project_id=#{pId} and version.status=1
update version set version.status=0 ,version.enduser_id=#{userId},version.endtime=now() where version.project_id=#{pId} and version.status=1
